amendment.description: To strengthen homeland security by adding $10 million to National Defense for an interoperable and survivable mobile wireless communications network enabling clear, reliable communications among DoD and first responders for the military homeland defense command.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3023 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3023 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Salazar.
